H. Mishima, Squares consisting of 3 different digits
mathematica: Flatten[Table[Select[FromDigits/@Tuples[{1,2,9},n], IntegerQ[Sqrt[#]]&],{n,12}]] (* This program generates only the first 9 terms of the sequence *) (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Oct 19 2011 *)
